verses.content: Chun, a kum sari kum chun Jehoiada chu ân sukhrât a, sipai za pâwl chunga hotuhai, Jeho- ram naupa Azaria hai, Jehohanan naupa Ismael hai, Obed naupa Azaria hai, Adaia naupa Maaseia hai, Zikri naupa Elisaphat hai le chun thu a thlung a.
Chun, Juda ram sûnga chun a fe vêl a, Juda khawpui po poa inthawk chu Levi mihai le, Israel pahnam ṭhuoituhai le chun a lâk khâwm a, Jerusalema chun an fe tah a.

Chun, mipui inkhâwmhai po po chun Pathien ina chun lal le thutiem an siem tah a. Chun, an kuomah a hril a, “David naupasalhai chungthu LALPAIN a hril ta angin, en ta u lal naupa hin ro a rêl ding a na.
Hi hi thil in thaw ding chu hung nîng a tih: Châwlnia hung hlak, thiempuhai le Levi mihai hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai nîng in ta;

a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lal inah um an ta, a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lungphûmna dai kawtkhâr bulah um an ta; chun, mipui po po chu LALPA in inhuonna tuol sûnglaia chun um an tih.

Amiruokchu, thiempuhai ti chau naw chu mi tukhawm LALPA ina chun fe naw raw hai se; Levi mi rawngbâwltuhai le chau chun anni chu hung lût an tih, an inthieng sih a; amiruokchu, mipuihai po po chun LALPA chu an nghâk seng ding a nih.

Levi mihai chun, mi tin an râlthuomhai chawi sengin lal chu ngîr huol an ta; amiruokchu, mi tukhawm LALPA ina hung lût chu that ni raw se; nangni chu lal a hung lût le a fe suok huna chun a kâwla chun um zing in tih,” tiin.

Chuongchun, Levi mihai le Juda mihai po po chun thiempu Jehoiadain thu a pêk ang tak chun an thaw tah a; mi tin chun anni mihai châwlnia fe suok dinghai le hung lût dinghai chu an ṭhuoi vêl a; thiempu Jehoiada chun a ṭîn ding pâwlhai chu ân thlengtir si nawh a.
Thiempu Jehoiada chun Pathien ina um, lal David ta phawthai dâm, feihai dâm, âwmphâwhai dâm chu sipai za pâwl hotuhai kuoma chun a pêk suok tâwl a.
Mipuihai po po, mi tin el chu a râlthuom a kutah chawiin, lal sîrvêla le, in mâichâm sirvêl po poa chun, in sîr changtieng panga inthawka in sîr vawitieng panga chen chun ân umtir a.

Chun, lal naupa chu an hung ṭhuoi suok a, lallukhum an inkhumtir a, thuinhriettir chu an pêk a; chuong- chun, lalah an siem tah a; chun, Jehoiada le a naupasalhai chun ama chu hriek an nâl a, “Lal hi Pathienin sandam raw se,” an tih a.
Chun, Athalia chun mipui tlân vêl ri le lal an chawimawi ri chu a hrietin, LALPA ina chun mipuihai kuoma chun a va feh tah a;

chun, a hei en a, lûtna bula chun lal chu a sûtpui kâwla chun a ngîr a, sipai hotuhai le tawtawrâwt puhai khawm chu lal kâwla chun an um a. Chuongchun, ram sûng mi po po chu an hlim bêk bêk a, tawtawrâwthai an mût a; hla saktuhai khawm chun hla sakna thuomhnawhai chu sutin, chawimawina hla chu an sak tah a. Chun, Athalia chun a puonhai chu a keithlêr a, “Phierrûkna, phierrûkna,” tiin a khêk a.

Chun, thiempu Jehoiada chun sipai pâwl chunga siea um, za pâwl hotuhai chu a hung ṭhuoi suok a, an kuomah, “Sipai tlarhai kâra khan insuoktir ro; tukhawm ama zui taphawt chu kâwlhnâma that nîng an tih, thiempu chun, ‘LALPA ina chun ama chu that naw ro,’ a ti sih a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama ta ding chun lampui chu an inken a, lal ina sakawr kawtkhâr lûtna tieng chun a feh a; chutaka chun an that tah a.
Chun, Jehoiada chun ama le mipuihai po po le, lal inkâra chun LALPA mihai chu an ni ding a nih, tiin thuthlung a siem tah a.
Chun, mipui po po chu Baal ina chun an va feh a, an suksiet a, a mâichâmhai le a limhai chu an suk- nâwi vawng a; Baal thiempu Mattan chu mâichâm hmaa chun an that tah a.

Chun, Jehoiada chun LALPA ina sinthawnahai chu thiempu Levi mihai kuta chun a ruot tah a; chuonghai chu Mosie dâna ziek anga LALPA kuoma pumrawhmang thilin- hlânhai, David thu lo pêk ta anga hlimtak le hla sak puma inhlân dinga LALPA ina Davidin a lo semdar tahai chu an nih.
Chun, LALPA in dâi kawtkhâra chun kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu a sieh a, mi tukhawm, ieng thila khawm inthieng nawna nei chu an lût nawna dingin.

Chun, za pâwl hotuhai, mi ṭhahai, mipui rorêltuhai le chu rama mi po pohai chu a ṭhuoi a, LALPA ina inthawk chun lal chu a hung ṭhuoi thlâk tah a; chun, dâi kawtkhâr sakhnungah hungin lal ina chun an hung a, lal chu lalram lalṭhungphaa chun an inṭhungtir tah a.
Chuongchun, chu rama mipui- hai po po chu an hlim êm êm a, khaw- pui chu râlmuongin a um a, Athalia chu kâwlhnâmin an that tah a.
